Class League

  • java.lang.Object
    • League

  • public class League
extends Object
    The league class processes the data in the match, clubs and player classes and holds the fixtures and results.
    Author:
    Gary Carr

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      League(String leagueName, int maxNoOfTeams)
      The constructor for league creates an empty league and initializes multiple ArrayLists - clubs in the league, a future fixture list, a past fixtures list, and the top scorer in the league.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFixture(Match m, League l)
      This method is called from the Match class the newly created match to the fixture ArrayList.
      void addLeagueClub(Club newLeagueClub)
      Method adds a club to the ArrayList league.
      String displayTopScorer()
      Prints the top goal scorers to the console
      Match getFixtureItem(int selectMatch, League l)
      Method is used by the league IO to select a fixture after the user has inputted a number into the console IO.

      Method returns the number of future fixtures set in the league
      ArrayList<Player> getGoldenBoot()
      Method searches through each team and obtains the players goal tallys.
      ArrayList<Club> getLeagueClub()
      Method returns an ArrayList of all the leagues clubs for the LeagueIO to get a team

      Method returns the how many teams are in the league
      Club getLeagueItem(int selectClub, League l)
      Method is used by the league IO to select a club after the user has inputted a number into the console IO.
      String getLeagueName()
      Method returns the leagues name
      String getLeagueTable()
      Method prints the league table after ranking the clubs in order based on the compareTo method in club.
      int getMaxTeams()
      Method is used to display a message in the console IO to show user how many more teams can be entered.

      Method is used by the league IO to select a past fixture after the user has inputted a number into the console IO.
      int getResultFixtureSize()
      Method returns the number of finished matches in the league
      Club getTopTeam()
      Method sorts all teams in the ArrayList leagueClubs then returns the current top team in the league as defined by compareTo in the match class

      Method tests if the selected club is part of the league.

      Method changes the name of the league

      User inputs a maximum number of teams for the league.
      String showClubs()
      Method prints out a list of the club names which have been added to the league
      String showFinishedMatches()
      Method prints all the results in the league
      String showFutureMatches()
      Method prints all matches in the future for the chosen league
      static void testLeague()
      This is a testing method to test the above methods work.
      void updateFixture(Match m)
      Method is called when a match result is confirmed and removes a game from the fixture ArrayList and adds it to the completed games once the match has been complete

    • Constructor Detail

      • League

        public League(String leagueName,
      int maxNoOfTeams)
        The constructor for league creates an empty league and initializes multiple ArrayLists - clubs in the league, a future fixture list, a past fixtures list, and the top scorer in the league. The constructor then sets the maximum number of teams in the league
        Parameters:
        leagueName - This is the user inputted name for the league
        maxNoOfTeams - This is the user inputted maximum number of teams a league can contain

    • Method Detail

      • addFixture

        public void addFixture(Match m,
              League l)
        This method is called from the Match class the newly created match to the fixture ArrayList. There is a test to ensure the match does not already exist in the fixtures and pastFixtures ArrayLists first to stop duplication, and if not it is added
        Parameters:
        m - This is the match object which will be added to the fixture list
        l - This is the league that the match will be part of

      • addLeagueClub

        public void addLeagueClub(Club newLeagueClub)
        Method adds a club to the ArrayList league. It tests to ensure that the club is not going to exceed the max teams allowed before adding

      • displayTopScorer

        public String displayTopScorer()
        Prints the top goal scorers to the console
        Returns:
        Returns a display of the top scorers

      • getFixtureItem

        public Match getFixtureItem(int selectMatch,
                   League l)
        Method is used by the league IO to select a fixture after the user has inputted a number into the console IO. Method then returns this match
        Parameters:
        selectMatch - This is the user inputted match they have selected, and it is mapped to the matches position in the fixture array list
        l - This is the league that the matches belong to
        Returns:
        Returns the match object that the user has picked

      • getFixtureSize

        public int getFixtureSize()
        Method returns the number of future fixtures set in the league
        Returns:
        Returns the amount of fixtures in the ArrayList fixtures

      • getGoldenBoot

        public ArrayList<Player> getGoldenBoot()
        Method searches through each team and obtains the players goal tallys. When they are found to be equal or higher to the highest amount they are added to the ArrayList topScorer and the list is updated accordingly
        Returns:
        Returns an arraylist containing the top scorers in the league

      • getLeagueClub

        public ArrayList<Club> getLeagueClub()
        Method returns an ArrayList of all the leagues clubs for the LeagueIO to get a team
        Returns:
        Returns a club from the ArrayList

      • getLeagueCurrentSize

        public int getLeagueCurrentSize()
        Method returns the how many teams are in the league
        Returns:
        Returns the current size of the league

      • getLeagueItem

        public Club getLeagueItem(int selectClub,
                 League l)
        Method is used by the league IO to select a club after the user has inputted a number into the console IO.
        Parameters:
        selectClub - This is the user inputted club they have selected, and it is mapped to the matches position in the pastFixture array list
        l - This is the league that the club belong to
        Returns:
        Returns the club object from the ArrayList

      • getLeagueName

        public String getLeagueName()
        Method returns the leagues name
        Returns:
        Returns the leagues name

      • getLeagueTable

        public String getLeagueTable()
        Method prints the league table after ranking the clubs in order based on the compareTo method in club.
        Returns:
        Returns the league table

      • getMaxTeams

        public int getMaxTeams()
        Method is used to display a message in the console IO to show user how many more teams can be entered.
        Returns:
        Returns the maximum number of teams a league is allowed to have

      • getPastFixtureItem

        public Match getPastFixtureItem(int selectMatch,
                       League l)
        Method is used by the league IO to select a past fixture after the user has inputted a number into the console IO.
        Parameters:
        selectMatch - This is the user inputted match they have selected, and it is mapped to the matches position in the pastFixture array list
        l - This is the league that the matches belong to
        Returns:
        Returns the match object that the user has picked

      • getResultFixtureSize

        public int getResultFixtureSize()
        Method returns the number of finished matches in the league
        Returns:
        Returns the amount of fixtures in the ArrayList pastFixtures

      • getTopTeam

        public Club getTopTeam()
        Method sorts all teams in the ArrayList leagueClubs then returns the current top team in the league as defined by compareTo in the match class
        Returns:
        Returns a club object

      • isClubInLeague

        public boolean isClubInLeague(Club clubs)
        Method tests if the selected club is part of the league. This method is solely used for unit testing
        Parameters:
        club - This takes a club object
        Returns:
        Returns true if club is part of the team

      • setLeagueName

        public void setLeagueName(String leagueName)
        Method changes the name of the league
        Parameters:
        leagueName - This is inputted by the user and used as a new name for the league

      • setMaxNoOfTeams

        public void setMaxNoOfTeams(int maxNoOfTeams)
        User inputs a maximum number of teams for the league. A while loops ensures 2 or more teams must be entered
        Parameters:
        maxNoOfTeams - Sets the maximum number of teams the league is allowed to have

      • showClubs

        public String showClubs()
        Method prints out a list of the club names which have been added to the league
        Returns:
        Returns a print out of all the league clubs

      • showFinishedMatches

        public String showFinishedMatches()
        Method prints all the results in the league
        Returns:
        Returns the printed list of the clubs

      • showFutureMatches

        public String showFutureMatches()
        Method prints all matches in the future for the chosen league
        Returns:
        Returns a print out of the future fixture list

      • testLeague

        public static void testLeague()
        This is a testing method to test the above methods work. Each test gives in text what the answer should be, a demonstration of the answer, and then a coding test to ensure that Java confirms the answers are correct

      • updateFixture

        public void updateFixture(Match m)
        Method is called when a match result is confirmed and removes a game from the fixture ArrayList and adds it to the completed games once the match has been complete
        Parameters:
        m - This is the match which is being updated
